TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetTcpBinding extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences
Public Class NetTcpBinding Inherits Binding Implements IBindingRuntimePreferences

summary.span: 一個適用於跨電腦通訊的安全、可靠的繫結。

span.span: A secure, reliable binding suitable for cross-machine communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設， 產生執行階段通訊堆疊，它使用傳輸安全、TCP 進行訊息傳遞，以及二進位訊息編碼。The generates a run-time communication stack by default, which uses transport security, TCP for message delivery, and a binary message encoding. 這個繫結是適當 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 系統提供的現成選擇在內部網路進行通訊。This binding is an appropriate Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) system-provided choice for communicating over an Intranet. 預設組態的速度比所提供的組態，但它只適用於 WCF 通訊。The default configuration for the is faster than the configuration provided by the , but it is intended only for WCF communication. 您可以使用建構函式中的選擇性 `securityMode` 參數，設定安全性行為。The security behavior is configurable using the optional `securityMode` parameter in the constructor. 您可以使用選擇性的 `reliableSessionEnabled` 參數，設定是否要使用 WS-ReliableMessaging。The use of WS-ReliableMessaging is configurable using the optional `reliableSessionEnabled` parameter. 不過可信賴傳訊預設為關閉。But reliable messaging is off by default. 較常見地，HTTP 系統提供繫結，例如 及 設定好可預設啟動，而 繫結則預設關閉，因此必須 Opt-In 以尋求支援，例如 WS-\* 規格其中一個。More generally, the HTTP system-provided bindings such as and are configured to turn things on by default, whereas the binding turns things off by default so that you have to opt-in to get support, for example, for one of the WS-\* specifications. 這意味著預設的 TCP 組態在端點間交換訊息，較依照預設針對 HTTP 繫結所設定的還快。This means that the default configuration for TCP is faster at exchanging messages between endpoints than that configured for the HTTP bindings by default. > [!WARNING] > TCP 連線集區為基礎的服務會使用裝載的 DNS 名稱和服務接聽的通訊埠編號。The uses TCP connection pooling based on the service’s host DNS name and the port number the service is listening on. 這就非常適合當用戶端會呼叫不同的連接埠上的不同服務或服務裝載於單一處理程序，共用連接埠。This works well when a client makes calls to different services on different ports, or services are hosted in a single process and share a port. 如果單一用戶端呼叫的多個服務共用連接埠裝載於不同的處理序或 WAS / IIS 裝載、 用戶端端集區可能會導致問題服務 B，所擲回例外狀況所導致的重複使用連接至服務的連線已中止，並建立新的通道。If a single client calls multiple services sharing a port that are hosted in different processes, or are WAS/IIS hosted, the client side pooling may lead to problems where a connection to Service A is reused for Service B, resulting in an exception being thrown, the connection aborted, and a new channel created. 若要避免這個問題，使用 CustomBinding 並指定每個服務用戶端的不同 ConnectionPoolSettings.GroupName 與通訊。To avoid this problem, use a CustomBinding and specify a different ConnectionPoolSettings.GroupName for each service the client communicates with. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何建立 並設定安全模式和傳輸認證類型。This example shows how to create a , setting the security mode and transport credential type. [!code-csharp[S_UENetTcpBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenettcpbinding/cs/source.cs#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用建構函式中的選擇性 `securityMode` 參數，設定安全性行為。The security behavior is configurable using the optional `securityMode` parameter in the constructor. 您可以使用選擇性的 `reliableSessionEnabled` 參數，設定是否要使用 WS-ReliableMessaging。The use of WS-ReliableMessaging is configurable using the optional `reliableSessionEnabled` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按照預設，傳輸安全用來保護通訊安全 (也就是， 的值設為 ) 而且停用可靠工作階段 (也就是 為 `false`)。By default, transport security is used to secure communication (that is, the value of is set to ) and reliable sessions are disabled (that is is `false`). ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何建立 並設定安全模式和傳輸認證類型。This example shows how to create a , setting the security mode and transport credential type. [!code-csharp[S_UENETTCPBINDING#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenettcpbinding/cs/source.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定安全性時，請使用這個建構函式。Use this constructor when you want to configure the security. 如果您要設定安全性並啟用可靠工作階段，請使用 。If you want to configure security and enable reliable sessions, use . ## Examples 此範例說明如何使用安全性模式參數建立 。This example shows how to create a using the security mode parameter. span.span: One of the values that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching the URI.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示比對時忽略主機名稱。

span.span: The default value is , which ignores the hostname in the match.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ListenBacklog { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可以擱置之佇列連線要求的最大數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of queued connection requests that can be pending.

value.span: 傳回擱置中之已佇列連線要求的最大數目。

span.span: Returns the maximum number of pending queued connection requests.

value.span: 預設值為 10。

span.span: The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一個通訊端層級的屬性，用來說明要排入佇列之「暫停接受」要求的數目。 is a socket-level property that describes the number of "pending accept" requests to be queued. 如果接聽待辦項目佇列已滿，將會拒絕新的通訊端要求。If the listen backlog queue fills up, new socket requests will be rejected. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 值。This example shows how to get the value. [!code-csharp[S_UENetTcpBinding#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenettcpbinding/cs/source.cs#8)]

span.span: The value cannot be less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxBufferPoolSize { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存繫結所處理之 TCP 訊息的可用緩衝集區大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, allowed for a buffer pool that stores TCP messages processed by the binding.

value.span: 儲存繫結所處理之 TCP 訊息的可用緩衝集區大小上限。

span.span: The maximum size allowed for a buffer pool that stores TCP messages processed by the binding.

value.span: 預設值為 524,288 個位元組。

span.span: The default value is 524,288 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您接收超出可以緩衝的資料，則超出緩衝大小的資料會保留在基礎通訊端中，直到緩衝區再度有空間可存放其他資料為止。If you receive more data than you can buffer, the data that exceeds the buffer size remains on the underlying socket until your buffer has room for the rest of the data. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 值。This example shows how to get the value. [!code-csharp[S_UENetTcpBinding#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenettcpbinding/cs/source.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定記憶體中用來儲存訊息的緩衝區大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer used to store messages in memory.

value.span: 記憶體中用於儲存訊息的緩衝區大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer used to store messages in memory.

value.span: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您接收超出可以緩衝的資料，則超出緩衝大小的資料會保留在基礎通訊端中，直到緩衝區再度有空間可存放其他資料為止。If you receive more data than you can buffer, the data that exceeds the buffer size remains on the underlying socket until your buffer has room for the rest of the data. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 值。This example shows how to get the value of the . MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConnections { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，控制在用戶端後續重複使用的共用連接數量上限，以及允許在伺服器上暫止分派的連接數量上限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls the maximum number of connections to be pooled for subsequent reuse on the client and the maximum number of connections allowed to be pending dispatch on the server.

value.span: 在用戶端，後續重複使用的共用連接數量上限；在伺服器，暫止分派允許的連接數量上限。

span.span: On the client, the maximum number of connections to be pooled for subsequent reuse; on the server, the maximum number of connections allowed to be pending dispatch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 10。The default value is 10. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 值。This example shows how to get the value. [!code-csharp[S_UENetTcpBinding#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenettcpbinding/cs/source.cs#11)]

span.span: The maximum size (in bytes) for a received message that is processed by the binding.

value.span: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

span.span: if TCP port sharing is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個設定必須將啟動類型 改為手動或自動啟用 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) TCP Port Sharing Service。Using this setting requires enabling the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) TCP Port Sharing Service by changing its startup type to Manual or Automatic. 如需 TCP 接聽程式，以及如何啟動它的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the TCP Listener and how to start it, see . ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 值。This example shows how to get the value. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas ^ ReaderQuotas { System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 訊息複雜性的條件約束，而這些條件約束可由以此繫結所設定的端點處理。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: ，指定已交換之 SOAP 訊息的複雜度條件約束。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints on soap messages exchanged.

value.span: 接下來的「備註」一節提供了這些條件約束的預設值。

span.span: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複雜性條件約束可以防止嘗試使用訊息複雜性困住端點處理資源的阻絕服務 (DOS) 攻擊類別。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示這些條件約束及其預設值的屬性包括：The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384 ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何取得 物件。The following example shows how to get the object. [!code-csharp[S_UENetTcpBinding#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenettcpbinding/cs/source.cs#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此執行階段接收訊息的行為在服務或用戶端應用程式可以使用變更[ <synchronousReceive>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/synchronousreceive-element.md)。This run-time behavior for receiving messages in either a service or client application can be changed using [<synchronousReceive>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/synchronousreceive-element.md). ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 值。This example shows how to get the value.
